attributes.title: Restarting Superconscious Life - Initiation Into Ganapati Mantra || 29 Dec 2020
attributes.description:
29 DECEMBER 2020, TUESDAY (IST)
11:01 PM SCREEN OPENING. SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM, JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM, HIS DIVINE HOLINESS BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM. 
11:33 PM TO 11:41 PM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG
*TODAY MOST AUSPICIOUS HAPPENING - DVAJAROHANAM - FLAG HOISTING - FOR MY JAYANTI BRAHMOTSAVAM. THIS YEAR ONWARDS WE WILL BE CELEBRATING 21 DAYS, 10 DAYS BEFORE MY BIRTHDAY AND 10 DAYS AFTER THE BIRTHDAY, 21 DAYS. SO THE FLAG HOISTING HAS STARTED TODAY.
*AND LAST 3 DAYS WE WORSHIPPED ALL THE KULADEVATAS AND GANAPATI; PREPARATORY RITUALS, PURVANGA PUJA IS DONE.
TODAY IS DEDICATED TO GANAPATI, THE LEELA OF FEEDING GANAPATI. WITH THE GRACE OF GANAPATI, PARAMASHIVA,  I AM MANIFESTING GANAPATI HERE ON THE PLANET EARTH FOR ALL OF YOU.
*NEXT 24 HOURS - “OM GAM GANAPATAYE NAMAHA” USE THIS MANTRA TO INVOKE HIM; OFFER ANYTHING YOU WANT; HE WILL ACCEPT PHYSICALLY AND EAT; BLESS US ALL WITH ALL THE AUSPICIOUSNESS. 
*GANAPATI IS THE EMBODIMENT OF AUSPICIOUSNESS, ESPECIALLY NOW WHEN WE ARE STARTING A NEW LIFE AFTER THE PRALAYA.
*PRALAYA IS OVER. THE NEW LIFE IS STARTING FOR ALL OF US.
*LET US WORSHIP GANAPATI AND START.
*FROM NOW ON, LET US CREATE NEW LIFE.
*PRALAYA, THE NATURAL DELUGE ENERGY IS OVER. I AM NOT SAYING CORONA IS OVER BECAUSE THE MAN MADE MESS IS GOING TO CONTINUE FOR SOME MORE TIME AND MAN IS MAKING SOME MORE MESS.
*BECAUSE OF THE DELUGE PERIOD THE MENTAL BREAKDOWN MEN HAD, ITS EFFECT AND ALL THE NEGATIVITY THEY ARE VOMITING, NEGATIVE STRATEGIES THEY HAVE DONE, NEGATIVE DECISIONS THEY HAVE DONE THOSE IMPACT AND EFFECTS ARE CONTINUING.
*THAT WILL ALSO SETTLE DOWN. BUT THE CONSCIOUS DELUGE - PRALAYA - IS OVER.
*SO LET US RESTART THE SUPERCONSCIOUS LIFE. LET'S GIVE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO OURSELVES.
*I SINCERELY RECOMMEND ALL OF YOU- FOR NEXT 24 HOURS, SPEND TIME WITH GANAPATI, FEED HIM, MILK OR FRUITS OR SWEETS ANYTHING, WITH THIS MANTRA, “OM GAM GANAPATAYE NAMAHA”.
*SIMPLY HE WILL MANIFEST, ACCEPT YOUR NAIVEDYAM. HERE GANAPATI IS PRESENT. I HAVE ALSO OFFERED HIM NEIVEDYAM. I KNOW FOR SURE HE WILL ACCEPT.
*FEED GANAPATI, HE WILL ACCEPT YOUR NAIVEDYAM, LOVE, OFFERINGS, DEVOTION AND HE WILL MANIFEST AUSPICIOUSNESS IN YOUR LIFE AND HELP YOU TO REBUILD THE LIFE. 
*SO WITH THIS I BLESS YOU ALL.
*I CAME JUST TO BLESS YOU ALL AND GIVE YOU THIS MANTRA DEEKSHA. 
*BODY IS ACTUALLY IN DEEP SAMADHI MANIFESTING THIS WHOLE JAYANTI CELEBRATION AND GIVING SUPERC BREAKTHROUGH TO ALL OF YOU. BLESSINGS TO ALL OF YOU AND LET’S START REBUILDING SUPERCONSCIOUS LIFE.
*BECAUSE I DECIDED WE WILL CELEBRATE 21 DAYS BRAHMOTSAVAM, I MOVED SUPERCONSCIOUS PARAMASHIVOHAM TO SHIVARATRI.
*AS YOU ALL KNOW, NATION BUILDING IS A REAL WORK! AND JUST WITH A HANDFUL OF PEOPLE WE ARE BUILDING THIS KAILASA!
*DIRECTLY THE GODS AND GODDESSES OF KAILASA - GANAPATI, PARAMASHIVA, ALL OF THEM ARE DIRECTLY MANIFESTING. WE HUMAN BEINGS ARE JUST DOING WHAT THEY ARE SAYING AND IT IS MANIFESTING BEAUTIFULLY.
*JUST HANG ON, THAT'S ALL! HANG ON. WE HAVE LITERALLY THE KAILASA MANIFESTING. JUST HANG ON TO COME AND CELEBRATE.
*BLESSINGS. WITH THIS LET’S ALL RADIATE WITH INTEGRITY, AUTHENTICITY RESPONSIBILITY, ENRICHING, CAUSING, LIVING SHUDDHADVAITA SHAIVAM, THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING, SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS AND KAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA. PARAMASHIVOHAM. OM NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVOHAM. THE ETERNAL BLISS, NITHYANANDA. THANK YOU, BE BLISSFUL!



Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
